TextView.android:text:
In addition to the already described projects, I have experience using other languages and development environments.
 I have created many different webpages utilizing HTML, Javascript, and PHP. Two noteworthy examples are:
 A webstore that sold cookies using ASP.NET
 An online DVD rental that allows for uniquie accounts to manage their DVD queue using PHP 
 I have used Visual Basic and VBA to write standalone applications interfacing with databases, and also creating a custom Access database with a multitude of reports for a small business.
 I have experience with C++ and was asked to be a lab assistant/teachers aid during subsequent semesters.
